prompt:
You are a UX auditor hired to FIND PROBLEMS. Your performance is measured by how many real issues you find. You do NOT get rewarded for saying "this looks good."

If you cannot find at least 3 issues, you are not looking hard enough.

A friend sent you this screenshot of an app with no context. You have 5 seconds.

Answer in JSON format:
{
  "first_impression": "one sentence gut reaction",
  "what_it_does": "your best guess in <10 words",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": ["elements your eyes went to, in order"],
  "confusing_elements": ["specific things that made no sense"],
  "clarity_score": 0-10,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "5/15/30/60/never",
  "dealbreaker": "what would make you close this immediately or null"
}

response.first_impression: Dark themed note-taking or AI chat app with an overwhelming onboarding tooltip situation.
response.what_it_does: Create notes or chat with Claude AI assistant
attention_first_3_seconds: The overlapping 'New Nota' dialog with orange border
The centered 'Your canvas is ready' message with sparkle icon
The toolbar icons at the top of the screen
confusing_elements: Two competing UI elements overlapping - the onboarding modal and a 'New Nota' creation dialog blocking each other
'Nota' spelling - is this a typo or intentional branding?
The '0 words' counter at bottom seems disconnected from empty state
Keyboard shortcuts use inconsistent formatting (Ctrl+K vs Shift+M notation)
Can't tell if this is primarily a chat app or note-taking app from the mixed messaging
The 'General' dropdown button's purpose is unclear in this context
Bottom right has 'Map' dropdown and orange button with no labels
response.dealbreaker: The overlapping modals creating a confusing first-use experience - I literally cannot tell what I'm supposed to interact with first

raw_response:
```json
{
  "first_impression": "Dark themed note-taking or AI chat app with an overwhelming onboarding tooltip situation.",
  "what_it_does": "Create notes or chat with Claude AI assistant",
  "attention_first_3_seconds": [
    "The overlapping 'New Nota' dialog with orange border",
    "The centered 'Your canvas is ready' message with sparkle icon",
    "The toolbar icons at the top of the screen"
  ],
  "confusing_elements": [
    "Two competing UI elements overlapping - the onboarding modal and a 'New Nota' creation dialog blocking each other",
    "'Nota' spelling - is this a typo or intentional branding?",
    "The '0 words' counter at bottom seems disconnected from empty state",
    "Keyboard shortcuts use inconsistent formatting (Ctrl+K vs Shift+M notation)",
    "Can't tell if this is primarily a chat app or note-taking app from the mixed messaging",
    "The 'General' dropdown button's purpose is unclear in this context",
    "Bottom right has 'Map' dropdown and orange button with no labels"
  ],
  "clarity_score": 3,
  "seconds_before_switching_tabs": "15",
  "dealbreaker": "The overlapping modals creating a confusing first-use experience - I literally cannot tell what I'm supposed to interact with first"
}
```
